cards.rules_text:
Flash
Daybound [i](If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]The rocky hills provide ample shelter from rain, poachers, bandits, …[/i]
cards.rules_text2:
If a spell would resolve, instead counter it unless its controller pays two life for each other spell they've cast this turn. 
Nightbound [i](If a player casts at least two spells during their own turn, it becomes day next turn.)[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Creatures you control have soulbond. [i](Unpaired creatures may pair as either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.)[/i]
Whenever you cast a spell that targets a creature you control and could target another creature paired with it, copy that spell. The copy targets the other creature.

At the beginning of your end step, you lose 1 life and create a 1/1 blue Bird Illusion creature token with flying.
When Dewdrop Strawman becomes the target of a spell, sacrifice it and each Illusion token you control. You gain 1 life for each token sacrificed this way.

Exile any number of target artifacts with total mana value twice X or less. For each artifact exiled this way, create a 0/1 red Alien Beast creature token with prowess and “This creature can't block alone.”
cards.flavor_text: [i]Once built to eradicate invasive vermin, the rusted remains now shelter former quarry.[/i]
